data.name: OWL Trust is a news reader application that helps users access the latest and most accurate news
data.value: OWL Trust is a news reader application that helps users access the latest and most accurate news

data.name: App content
data.value: These privacy statements apply to all personal information entered by Owl Trust customers – Fake News Filter on the Owl Trust website or entered into the Owl Trust application via mobile devices (along with the Owl Trust application). using the Owl Trust platform).

data.name: Approve and update information content
data.value: Customers may request at any time to view the personal information that Owl Trust stores or to correct or update any personal information. Please email the Owl Trust at khuyenpb@gmail.com.

data.name: Change privacy policy content
data.value: Owl Trust may amend or update this Privacy Policy from time to time, without notice to Owl Trust customers. All customers agree to be bound by the Privacy Policy in effect at the time they access the Owl Trust website and/or use the software via a mobile device.

data.name: commitment content
data.value: At Owl Trust – Fake News Filter we understand that privacy is very important to you and your customers. These privacy statements reflect our respect for your privacy and Owl Trust's commitment to the security of all your information.

data.name: Cookies content
data.value: Owl Trust uses third parties for advertising and tracking campaigns, the data is collected through advertising and tail advertising. Advertising cookies are stored in your browser and provide third parties with data to make advertising more relevant to visitors to our website and avoid the advertisements displayed. This is based on your previous web history. Cookie advertising provides data to display ads through third-party websites based on your previous interaction with the Owl Trust website. Opt-out options are available, and if at any time you would like to opt out of these features, visit the opt-out options, for more information.

data.name: Disclosure information content
data.value: Owl Trust will not disclose any customer's personal information to third parties except where the disclosure is related to the purpose of the information collected (As mentioned in paragraph 4 above) except without the customer's permission.

data.name: Effects of information and documents content
data.value: The personal information the customer has provided will only be used in connection with the service that has been requested by the Owl Trust, to chat with the customer regarding the service or to cooperate with the industry. government or authorities. Owl Trust stores it precisely to use the data in connection with the customer's use of the service for promotion or other business intelligence purposes. Owl Trust employees can access useful information and transaction statistics to better understand how customers use the Owl Trust platform application, so we can improve the design system, review, as well as give advice to change the way they use their Owl Trust background application.

data.name: Information content
data.value: To use the Owl Trust - Fake News Filter background application, all customers are required to submit certain personal information such as email address, name, address, phone number, industry and certain company information. . Customers may be asked to provide additional information from time to time as they continue to use the software.

data.name: Information repository content
data.value: Owl Trust will securely store the personal information of customers in the United States or any other country that Owl Trust may choose from time to time to provide its services.

data.name: Letter of consen content
data.value: By accessing the Owl Trust-based application, all customers consent to the collection, use, agreement, storage and processing of their information in accordance with the Privacy Statement.

data.name: News content policy
data.value: Owl Trust sends payment information, product information, newsletters and notifications to you via email and, in some cases, within the Owl Trust messaging service background application. Where appropriate email or in background communication will contain instructions describing how you can opt-out of being removed from the mailing list.

data.name: Sign up for an account via email
data.value: Sign up for an account via email

data.name: Storage content
data.value: Owl Trust will store customers' personal information before and after canceling any account but only use it when Owl Trust is legally required to use it.

data.name: Terms of use content
data.value: Usage of the Owl Trust software is subject to these Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy to be read together.

data.name: We only send application information via email to you.
data.value: We only send application information via email to you.

data.name: Your privacy and accounts content
data.value: Registration data and other information are subject to our Privacy Policy. Your information may be stored and processed in the United States or any other country where Owl Trust has facilities and by using the Online Services you agree to transfer the information outside of the country. your family. If you access the Service with a password, you are solely responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of that password. If you give others access to your password to the Service, they will be able to view information about your account and make changes through the Application or Website for the Service. Likewise, if you provide someone with the pattern lock feature for a Service, they will be able to request information about your account and make changes through Customer Service. You agree to notify us immediately if you change your email address so that we may continue to contact you and send any notices required below. If you do not promptly notify us of the change, then any notice we send to your old email address will be deemed adequate notice.

data.name: Welcome content
data.value: OWL Trust is a news reader application that helps users access the latest and most accurate news

data.name: Change language content
data.value:
▪ Flexible system language and news language can be customized
▪ There are 2 languages in the system, English and Vietnamese
▪ News has 2 languages: English and Vietnamese
▪ The system default is English

data.name: Connect with us if you have problems using the app
data.value: Connect with us if you have problems using the app

data.name: Contribute news content
data.value:
▪ Users can contribute news to the system, admin will censor and post on the system if the news is reasonable.
▪ Users can find news contributed by other users here.
▪ Here will show information about the number of contributed posts by the user.
▪ Users can see detailed instructions in the instruction view box.

data.name: Home page interface to read news
data.value: Home page interface to read news

data.name: I agree to
data.value: I agree to terms of use

data.name: Log in content
data.value:
▪ When logging in for the first time, the person must register information, the information will be saved
▪ When logging in with a google account, facebook that previously had an account will not need to re-enter the information
▪ When exiting the application to the main screen, the login will be maintained, no need to log in again
▪ System language and news language can be customized at the top right
▪ Choose to agree to the terms of service to use the app

data.name: News classification content
data.value:
▪ Censored news will be displayed here
▪ Information that is confirmed to be correct will appear in the True News box ▪ Information that is confirmed to be false will appear in the Fake News box ▪ Everyone can read the announcement here by selecting the bell on the right package at the top of the page

data.name: Read news content
data.value:
▪ Users can read, choose the reliability of news, share news,…
▪ Users can comment and exchange with each other about that news.

data.name: Read news without logging in content
data.value:
Read news without logging in content ▪ Users can view the latest news of the system.
▪ The news users view when not logged in are the latest and hottest news of the day on many different topics.

data.name: Settings and profile content
data.value:
▪ Edit user's personal information here.
▪ User can customize system language and news language here.
▪ User can change followed topics.
▪ Users can connect other social networks with personal accounts.
▪ Users can view other information about OWL Trust.
▪ Users can rate the quality of the application.
▪ Users who have difficulty using the system can use the system's help feature.

data.name: View news list content
data.value:
▪ Once logged in, users can read the news and vote whether it is reliable or not ▪ Users can follow their favorite topics and view news stories here
▪ Users can see the notifications in the bell on the top right of the homepage

data.name: View news topics content
data.value:
▪ There are many themes for users to choose, many topics can be selected
▪ Users can see topics according to their chosen language, when they press the "Discover" button, they go to the login page
▪ First time login, user must choose at least 4 different themes
▪ Users can also customize the system language here
